attributes.action: Nigel Farage to step down as a UKIP leader.
attributes.background: Nigel Farage a man who doesn't know anything about politics is a man responsible for UK leaving the EU,the people of UK voted out because he promised millions of pounds would go to NHS and other public sectors which he denied now in a interview,you have been lied to only so you would vote LEAVE!

rejection.details: Any decision on whether or not Mr Farage stood down as UKIP leader would be one for him to take.
